## Ed25519.sign() method

Generates a RFC8032 EdDSA signature of given data with a given private key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static sign(options: {
        data: Uint8Array;
        key: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { data: Uint8Array; key: Uint8Array; } | The options for the signing operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the signature as a Uint8Array.
